    Create fake DOIs (Digital Object Identifiers)

    Source: R/doi.R
    ch_doi.Rd

    Create fake DOIs (Digital Object Identifiers)

    Usage

    ch_doi(n = 1)

    Arguments

    n

    (integer) number of things to get, any non-negative integer

    See also

    DOIProvider

    Examples

    ch_doi()
#> [1] "10.19904/36844-33253-243"
ch_doi(10)
#>  [1] "10.72144/uroh.1724917"     "10.9650/ahwv.67447437"    
#>  [3] "10.41807/29816-77356-7419" "10.53989/hrad.22253428"   
#>  [5] "10.98271/znoa.85209494"    "10.71638/69280-66710-8320"
#>  [7] "10.20818/43859.88902.3391" "10.60383/cwvk.50471744"   
#>  [9] "10.76246/76981.76243.1927" "10.10205/81961-39416-1431"
ch_doi(100)
#>   [1] "10.13337/qlgr.1129434"     "10.64747/qwat.13355416"
